data.content:
Twitch

Release Date: May 1, 2009

Twitch, the Plague Rat, is a devious and cunning champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With his release on May 1, 2009, Twitch quickly became a favorite among players due to his unique playstyle and intriguing backstory.

Background Story

Twitch's origins lie in the sewers of Zaun, a dark and twisted city known for its experimentation and disregard for ethics. Born as a normal rat, Twitch was exposed to toxic waste that seeped into the sewers from the laboratories above. Instead of perishing like his kin, Twitch mutated, gaining intelligence and a malevolent nature.

Driven by his insatiable hunger and desire for chaos, Twitch emerged from the sewers to wreak havoc on the unsuspecting citizens of Zaun. He became a symbol of fear, striking from the shadows and leaving a trail of disease and panic in his wake. His reputation as the Plague Rat grew, and he reveled in the chaos he caused.

However, Twitch's actions did not go unnoticed by the League of Legends, an organization that sought to maintain balance and order in the world. Recognizing his potential as a champion, the League offered Twitch a chance to join their ranks. Intrigued by the prospect of spreading his chaos on a larger scale, Twitch accepted the offer, becoming a champion in the Fields of Justice.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Twitch is a marksman champion, specializing in dealing high amounts of damage from a distance. His unique ability, Ambush, allows him to become invisible for a short duration, making him a formidable threat when used strategically. This ability, combined with his range and damage output, makes Twitch a deadly assassin capable of taking down unsuspecting enemies.

One of Twitch's greatest strengths is his ability to apply crowd control effects to multiple enemies with his ultimate, Spray and Pray. This ability allows his basic attacks to pierce through enemies, dealing damage to all targets in their path. When combined with his other abilities, Twitch can quickly decimate entire teams in team fights.

However, Twitch also has his fair share of weaknesses. His low base health and lack of mobility make him vulnerable to assassins and champions with high burst damage. Additionally, his reliance on positioning and stealth means that he can be easily countered by champions with area-of-effect abilities or crowd control effects that reveal his location.

Twitch in the Game

In the game, Twitch is primarily played in the bot lane as an ADC (Attack Damage Carry). His range and damage output make him a strong laner, capable of harassing and zoning out his opponents. With the support of a capable ally, Twitch can quickly snowball and become a late-game powerhouse.

One of Twitch's defining features is his ability to roam and gank other lanes. With his stealth and burst damage, Twitch can surprise unsuspecting enemies, turning the tide of battles in his team's favor. This playstyle requires careful map awareness and coordination with the team, as Twitch's success often hinges on his ability to catch opponents off guard.

As the game progresses, Twitch becomes increasingly dangerous. With the right items and positioning, he can single-handedly carry team fights, shredding through enemy champions with his rapid-fire attacks. However, it is important for Twitch players to balance aggression with caution, as his squishy nature leaves him vulnerable to focused attacks.

On the website developed for the League of Legends game, players can access detailed information and videos showcasing all of Twitch's skins. From the classic Plague Rat skin to the more extravagant Omega Squad or Medieval Twitch, players can explore the various cosmetic options available for Twitch, allowing them to personalize their gaming experience.

In conclusion, Twitch is a champion that embodies chaos and deception. With his unique abilities and playstyle, he offers a thrilling experience for players who enjoy outmaneuvering their opponents and striking fear into their hearts. Whether you choose to embrace the Plague Rat's dark nature or seek to control his unpredictable power, Twitch is a champion that will leave a lasting impression on the Fields of Justice.

Twitch (Default)

Cost: N/A | Release Date: N/A

Twitch, the Plague Rat, is a champion in the popular online multiplayer game League of Legends. As one of the game's original champions, Twitch has become a fan favorite over the years. With his unique playstyle and cunning abilities, Twitch has carved a niche for himself in the game's meta. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Twitch's default costume and explore all the intricate details of this iconic skin.

The Story of Twitch's Default Costume

Twitch's default costume represents his original appearance when he was first introduced to the League of Legends universe. As a sneaky and mischievous rat, Twitch's default skin perfectly captures his essence. He is depicted as a small, anthropomorphic rat wearing tattered clothing and carrying a crossbow. The costume showcases his agility and stealth, allowing him to blend into the shadows and strike fear into the hearts of his enemies.

The default skin features Twitch with a dirty, brown fur coat, symbolizing his life in the sewers and his association with filth and disease. His crossbow is intricately designed, with gears and mechanisms that highlight his resourcefulness and ingenuity. Twitch's eyes glow with a sinister green hue, reflecting his malevolent nature and his ability to spread chaos wherever he goes.

While the default skin may not have any additional visual effects or animations, it remains a classic choice for Twitch players. It represents the champion in his purest form, before any alterations or thematic changes were made. Many players appreciate the simplicity and authenticity of the default skin, as it allows them to connect with the character on a deeper level.

Twitch's Story and Role in League of Legends

Twitch's story within the League of Legends universe is as intriguing as his appearance. Born in the sewers beneath Zaun, a city known for its technological advancements and dark underbelly, Twitch was exposed to toxic waste that mutated him into the creature he is today. He thrived in the filth and chaos of the sewers, honing his skills and developing a taste for mayhem.

In the game, Twitch is classified as a marksman, specializing in dealing high amounts of damage from a distance. His abilities revolve around poison and stealth, making him a formidable opponent in both team fights and solo engagements. Twitch's passive ability, Deadly Venom, allows his basic attacks to apply stacks of poison to his enemies, dealing additional damage over time. His ultimate ability, Rat-Ta-Tat-Tat, enhances his attacks, allowing him to spray a barrage of bolts at multiple targets.

Twitch's strengths lie in his ability to surprise and ambush his enemies. With his stealth ability, Ambush, he can become invisible for a short duration, allowing him to position himself strategically and catch opponents off guard. His crowd control ability, Venom Cask, slows enemies and spreads his deadly poison, making it difficult for them to escape his clutches. However, Twitch's weaknesses lie in his fragility and vulnerability to crowd control effects. He relies heavily on positioning and timing to maximize his damage output while avoiding being caught out by enemy champions.

Throughout his journey in the League of Legends, Twitch has become a symbol of chaos and unpredictability. His unique playstyle and cunning abilities have made him a popular pick among players who enjoy outmaneuvering their opponents and wreaking havoc on the battlefield. Whether it's ambushing unsuspecting enemies or unleashing a deadly barrage of bolts, Twitch's default skin serves as a reminder of his origins and his relentless pursuit of chaos.

Explore Twitch's Appearances

If you want to learn more about Twitch's various appearances and skins, you can find detailed information and videos on our dedicated Twitch page. Discover the different costumes and themes that have been created for this iconic champion and witness Twitch's evolution throughout the years. From the classic default skin to the more extravagant and thematic options, Twitch offers a wide range of visual experiences for players to enjoy.

Whether you prefer the simplicity of the default skin or the flamboyance of his alternate costumes, Twitch remains a beloved champion in the League of Legends community. Embrace the chaos and join the ranks of Twitch players as you unleash your inner Plague Rat on the Summoner's Rift.

Twitch (SSW Twitch)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: May 14, 2014

Twitch, the Plague Rat, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his sneaky and deadly playstyle, Twitch has become a favorite among players who enjoy ambushing their enemies and causing chaos on the battlefield. One of Twitch's most iconic skins is the

skin, which was released on May 14, 2014, as part of the League of Legends World Championship celebration.

The

skin is a tribute to the professional League of Legends team Samsung White, who emerged victorious in the 2014 World Championship. The skin features Twitch dressed in the team's colors, sporting a white and blue outfit with the team's logo prominently displayed on his back. This skin not only allows players to show their support for the winning team but also adds a unique flair to Twitch's appearance in the game.

With the

skin, Twitch's abilities receive a visual overhaul to match the theme of the skin. His basic attacks now feature a blue particle effect, giving them a distinct look and feel. Additionally, his abilities, such as his Venom Cask and Spray and Pray, also receive visual updates, making them more visually appealing and satisfying to use.

As a champion, Twitch has a rich backstory within the League of Legends universe. He is a mutated rat from Zaun, a city known for its dark and dangerous underbelly. Twitch thrives in the shadows, using his deadly venom and sharp instincts to take down his enemies. His lore describes him as a cunning and sadistic creature, always seeking new victims to spread his plague.

In the game, Twitch is classified as a marksman, specializing in dealing high amounts of damage from a distance. His passive ability, Deadly Venom, allows his basic attacks to apply stacks of poison to his enemies, dealing additional damage over time. This ability synergizes well with his other abilities, such as his Ambush, which allows him to become invisible and gain bonus attack speed, and his Expunge, which detonates his poison stacks, dealing damage to all enemies affected.

However, Twitch also has his weaknesses. He is incredibly squishy and lacks mobility, making him vulnerable to assassins and burst damage champions. Additionally, his abilities require careful positioning and timing to maximize their effectiveness, as Twitch relies heavily on his stealth and surprise attacks to catch his enemies off guard.

In the competitive scene, Twitch has seen his fair share of play. His ability to ambush and assassinate key targets makes him a valuable pick for teams looking to secure early advantages and snowball their leads. His ultimate, Spray and Pray, allows him to deal damage to multiple enemies at once, making him a threat in team fights and sieges.

On this page, you can find all the information and videos about Twitch's various appearances in the game, including the
skin. Whether you're a fan of the professional scene or simply enjoy playing Twitch, this page will provide you with everything you need to know about this iconic champion and his skins.

Twitch (Twitch Shadowfoot)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: November 29, 2012

League of Legends is a game that offers a vast array of champions, each with their own unique abilities and playstyles. One such champion is Twitch, a sneaky and cunning rat-like creature who excels at stealth and assassination. Twitch has become a fan favorite due to his ability to wreak havoc on the battlefield, and now, with the release of the Twitch Shadowfoot skin, players can experience a whole new level of stealth and style.

The Twitch Shadowfoot skin, released on November 29, 2012, is a visually stunning addition to Twitch's repertoire. This skin transforms Twitch into a shadowy figure, clad in dark armor and equipped with deadly weapons. The design of the skin perfectly captures the essence of Twitch's sneaky and elusive nature, making him even more intimidating to his enemies.

One of the standout features of the Twitch Shadowfoot skin is the attention to detail. From the intricate patterns on his armor to the glowing green eyes that pierce through the darkness, every aspect of this skin has been meticulously crafted. The animations and effects associated with Twitch's abilities have also been revamped to match the theme of the skin, further enhancing the overall experience.

When playing as Twitch Shadowfoot, players will notice a significant difference in the way he moves and attacks. Twitch's stealthy nature is emphasized through his smooth and silent movements, allowing players to sneak up on unsuspecting enemies with ease. The skin also introduces new particle effects for Twitch's abilities, adding an extra layer of visual flair to his deadly arsenal.

Now, let's delve into the lore and background of Twitch, the champion behind the Twitch Shadowfoot skin. Twitch is a Zaunite plague rat who has risen from the depths of the city's sewers to wreak havoc on the surface. He is a cunning and sadistic creature, finding joy in spreading chaos and fear among his enemies.

In the game, Twitch is classified as a marksman, specializing in dealing damage from a distance. His passive ability, Deadly Venom, allows him to apply stacks of poison to his enemies, dealing additional damage over time. Twitch's Q ability, Ambush, grants him stealth and increased attack speed, making him a formidable assassin. His W ability, Venom Cask, slows and poisons enemies, while his E ability, Contaminate, allows him to detonate his poison stacks, dealing massive damage. Finally, Twitch's ultimate ability, Spray and Pray, enhances his basic attacks, allowing him to hit multiple enemies at once.

Twitch's strengths lie in his ability to surprise and eliminate enemies from the shadows. His stealth allows him to position himself strategically and catch opponents off guard. Additionally, his poison damage can quickly whittle down the health of his enemies, making him a deadly threat in team fights. However, Twitch is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making him vulnerable to crowd control and burst damage.

In the world of League of Legends, Twitch has become an iconic champion known for his unique playstyle and mischievous personality. He has been a staple pick in professional play, with players utilizing his stealth and assassination potential to great effect. Twitch's ability to turn the tide of a game with a well-executed ambush has made him a favorite among both casual and competitive players.

On the Twitch Shadowfoot skin page, players can find detailed information about Twitch's other skins, including their release dates and costs. Additionally, the page provides access to videos showcasing Twitch's various appearances, allowing players to get a closer look at his abilities and playstyle.

Whether you're a fan of Twitch's sneaky playstyle or simply appreciate the artistry behind the Twitch Shadowfoot skin, this page is a must-visit for all Twitch enthusiasts. Explore the world of Twitch and discover the many ways you can dominate the battlefield as this cunning and deadly champion.

Twitch (Crime City Twitch)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: November 29, 2012

Crime City Twitch is a skin for the champion Twitch in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on November 29, 2012, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 975 RP.

The Crime City Twitch skin transforms the sneaky rat into a stylish and cunning criminal. Dressed in a sleek black suit, complete with a fedora and a red tie, Twitch looks like he's ready to pull off the perfect heist. His crossbow is modified to resemble a Tommy gun, adding to his criminal persona. With this skin, Twitch becomes the ultimate underworld boss, lurking in the shadows and striking fear into the hearts of his enemies.

Crime City Twitch also features new visual effects and animations. When Twitch activates his Ambush ability, he disappears in a puff of smoke, leaving behind a silhouette of himself. This adds an extra layer of deception to his gameplay, allowing him to surprise his opponents and strike when they least expect it. Additionally, his auto-attacks and abilities have unique sound effects, further enhancing the immersive experience of playing as Crime City Twitch.

Twitch, the Plague Rat, is a champion in League of Legends known for his stealth and assassination abilities. He is a ranged AD carry who excels at dealing damage from a distance while remaining hidden from his enemies. Twitch's unique playstyle revolves around his ability to go invisible and surprise his opponents with deadly attacks.

In the lore of League of Legends, Twitch is a mutated rat who thrives in the sewers of Zaun, a city known for its dark and dangerous underbelly. He is a cunning and opportunistic creature, always on the lookout for his next meal or a chance to cause chaos. Twitch's past is shrouded in mystery, but it is believed that he was once an ordinary rat who was exposed to toxic waste, granting him enhanced intelligence and deadly abilities.

In the game, Twitch's strengths lie in his ability to deal massive amounts of damage in a short amount of time. His ultimate ability, Spray and Pray, allows him to fire his crossbow in a cone, hitting multiple enemies at once. This makes him a formidable team fighter, especially in tight spaces or during large-scale battles. Additionally, Twitch's stealth ability, Ambush, allows him to sneak up on unsuspecting enemies and take them out before they even have a chance to react.

However, Twitch also has his weaknesses. He is a very squishy champion, meaning that he can be easily killed if caught out of position or focused by the enemy team. His stealth ability has a long cooldown, making it crucial for Twitch players to time their engages carefully. Additionally, Twitch relies heavily on his positioning and map awareness, as he needs to be in the right place at the right time to maximize his damage output.

Overall, Twitch is a high-risk, high-reward champion who requires skill and strategy to master. With his Crime City Twitch skin, players can embody the essence of a cunning criminal and strike fear into the hearts of their opponents. Whether you prefer to play as a sneaky assassin or a ruthless gangster, Crime City Twitch offers a unique and exciting visual experience.

For more information about Twitch and his various appearances in League of Legends, including videos showcasing his abilities and skins, you can visit our dedicated page on the League of Legends website.

Twitch (Pickpocket Twitch)

Cost: 975 RP | Release Date: November 29, 2012

Twitch, the Plague Rat, is a mischievous and cunning champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his stealthy nature and deadly poison attacks, Twitch has become a favorite among players who enjoy playing as an unpredictable and sneaky character. One of Twitch's most iconic skins is the

costume, which adds a touch of style and flair to this notorious rat.

The Pickpocket Twitch skin was released on November 29, 2012, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 975 RP. This skin transforms Twitch into a dapper thief, complete with a stylish hat, a sleek black suit, and a pair of gloves perfect for picking pockets. With this skin, Twitch takes on the persona of a master pickpocket, ready to steal the show and your gold.

But what makes the Pickpocket Twitch skin truly stand out are the intricate details and animations that bring this costume to life. Twitch's crossbow is replaced with a fancy cane, adding a touch of elegance to his deadly attacks. As he moves around the battlefield, Twitch leaves behind a trail of gold coins, symbolizing his successful pickpocketing endeavors. His ultimate ability, Spray and Pray, is transformed into a flurry of golden coins, making it even more visually appealing and satisfying to use.

Now, let's delve into the lore and story behind Twitch, the Plague Rat. In the world of League of Legends, Twitch hails from Zaun, a city known for its dark and polluted streets. Born as a normal rat, Twitch was exposed to toxic waste that mutated him into a larger and more intelligent creature. Embracing his newfound abilities, Twitch became a skilled assassin, using his agility and poison to take down his enemies.

Twitch's strengths lie in his ability to surprise and ambush his opponents. With his stealth ability, Ambush, Twitch can disappear from sight and reposition himself for a devastating attack. His passive ability, Deadly Venom, allows him to apply stacks of poison to his enemies, dealing additional damage over time. Combined with his ultimate ability, Spray and Pray, Twitch becomes a force to be reckoned with, raining down a hail of poison-tipped bolts on his foes.

However, Twitch also has his weaknesses. He is a fragile champion, lacking in durability and sustain. If caught out of position or focused by the enemy team, Twitch can quickly be taken down. Additionally, his stealth ability can be countered by vision wards or champions with reveal abilities, making it harder for him to surprise his enemies.

In the game, Twitch is primarily played as an AD carry in the bot lane. His range and damage output make him a formidable threat in team fights, especially when he can position himself safely and unleash his ultimate ability. Twitch's playstyle revolves around finding opportunities to catch enemies off guard and quickly eliminating them with his burst damage.

If you're interested in learning more about Twitch and his various appearances in the game, you can find information and videos on the official League of Legends website. Whether you prefer the classic look of Twitch or want to embrace his pickpocket persona with the Pickpocket Twitch skin, this champion offers a unique and thrilling gameplay experience.

So, don't miss out on the chance to play as Twitch, the Plague Rat, and unleash chaos on the Rift. Whether you prefer to sneak around in the shadows or rain down poison from afar, Twitch is a champion that will keep you on your toes and leave your enemies scrambling for cover.

Twitch (Omega Squad Twitch)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: April 27, 2017

Omega Squad Twitch is a skin for the champion Twitch in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on April 27, 2017, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 1350 RP. With its unique design and special effects, Omega Squad Twitch offers players a fresh and exciting way to experience the game.

The Omega Squad skin line is known for its military-themed aesthetics, transforming champions into battle-hardened soldiers. Omega Squad Twitch is no exception, as it presents the sneaky rat-like champion as a covert operative ready to strike fear into the hearts of his enemies.

Omega Squad Twitch features a complete visual overhaul for the champion, including new model textures, animations, and sound effects. The skin gives Twitch a more rugged and battle-worn appearance, with a dark color scheme and military gear. His crossbow is replaced with a high-tech sniper rifle, adding to the theme of a stealthy assassin.

One of the standout features of Omega Squad Twitch is the unique recall animation. When Twitch recalls, he activates a holographic projection of himself, creating a decoy to confuse his enemies. This recall animation not only adds a cool visual effect but also adds to the theme of deception and trickery that Twitch embodies.

Omega Squad Twitch also includes new ability effects, enhancing the visual experience of playing the champion. His abilities now have a more high-tech and explosive feel, with new particle effects and sound design. For example, his Venom Cask ability now leaves behind a trail of toxic gas, adding to the overall theme of chemical warfare.

Now, let's delve into the lore and story of Twitch, the champion behind the Omega Squad skin. Twitch is a Yordle, a small and mischievous creature, known for his affinity for chaos and destruction. He hails from Zaun, a city in the world of Runeterra, known for its industrialization and dark underbelly.

In the game, Twitch is classified as a marksman, specializing in dealing damage from a distance. His playstyle revolves around stealth and surprise, as he can become invisible and ambush unsuspecting enemies. Twitch's abilities include a poison-infused auto-attack, a skillshot that slows enemies, a stealth ability, and a powerful ultimate that increases his attack speed and range.

Twitch's lore paints him as a scavenger, surviving in the sewers of Zaun and feeding off the waste and filth of the city. Over time, he mutated and grew larger, gaining a taste for human flesh. Twitch is driven by his insatiable hunger and desire to spread chaos, making him a fearsome and unpredictable force on the battlefield.

In the world of League of Legends, Twitch has become a fan-favorite champion due to his unique playstyle and quirky personality. He is often associated with surprise tactics and unconventional strategies, making him a challenging champion to master. Twitch's strengths lie in his ability to assassinate squishy targets quickly and his potential for massive area-of-effect damage with his ultimate ability.

However, Twitch also has his weaknesses. He is incredibly squishy and vulnerable to crowd control effects, making him an easy target for enemy assassins and tanks. Additionally, his stealth ability can be countered by vision wards and abilities that reveal invisible units, limiting his effectiveness in certain situations.

Overall, Twitch is a champion that rewards players who enjoy a more strategic and sneaky playstyle. With his Omega Squad skin, players can now experience Twitch in a whole new light, embracing the military theme and unleashing chaos on the battlefield.

For more information about Twitch and his various appearances, including the Omega Squad Twitch skin, you can visit the official League of Legends website or watch gameplay videos on platforms like YouTube and Twitch. Embrace the chaos and join the ranks of the Omega Squad!

Twitch (Vandal Twitch)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: November 29, 2011

Twitch, the Plague Rat, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his sneaky and deadly playstyle, Twitch has become a favorite among players who enjoy playing as an assassin. With his Vandal Twitch skin, he takes on a new and edgy look that perfectly matches his mischievous nature.

The Vandal Twitch skin was released on November 29, 2011, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 975 RP. This skin gives Twitch a rebellious and punk-inspired appearance, transforming him into a graffiti artist who is ready to cause chaos on the Rift.

With the Vandal Twitch skin, Twitch's default appearance is completely revamped. He ditches his traditional rat-like appearance for a more humanoid look, wearing a black leather jacket adorned with graffiti tags and a matching pair of pants. His tail is now wrapped in barbed wire, adding to his dangerous and menacing presence. Twitch's crossbow is also given a makeover, with a new graffiti design and a more rugged and worn-out look.

One of the standout features of the Vandal Twitch skin is the addition of new visual effects. When Twitch activates his Ambush ability, he leaves behind a trail of graffiti as he sneaks around the map. This adds a unique and visually appealing element to his gameplay, making him even more enjoyable to play as.

As for Twitch's story, he is a yordle from Zaun, a city known for its dark and dangerous underbelly. Twitch was once a normal sewer rat, but he was exposed to toxic waste that mutated him into the creature he is today. He thrives in the shadows, using his stealth and poison to take down his enemies.

In the game, Twitch is classified as a marksman and is primarily played in the bot lane as an ADC (Attack Damage Carry). His playstyle revolves around positioning himself strategically to deal damage from a safe distance. Twitch's passive ability, Deadly Venom, allows him to apply stacks of poison to his enemies, which can then be activated with his other abilities for additional damage. His ultimate ability, Rat-Ta-Tat-Tat, allows him to spray a hail of bullets in a cone, dealing damage to all enemies in its path.

While Twitch excels at dealing damage from a distance, he is also quite fragile and vulnerable to crowd control. He relies heavily on his stealth ability, Ambush, to position himself and surprise his enemies. However, he can be easily caught out if not played carefully. Additionally, Twitch's early game can be challenging, as he lacks the range and damage of other ADC champions. However, if he manages to survive the laning phase and reach his power spikes, he becomes a formidable force in team fights.

If you're interested in learning more about Twitch and his various appearances in the game, you can find more information and videos on his champion page on the official League of Legends website. Whether you prefer the classic look or the rebellious Vandal Twitch skin, Twitch offers a unique and exciting gameplay experience for those who enjoy playing as a stealthy and deadly assassin.

Twitch (Medieval Twitch)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: November 29, 2010

Twitch, the Plague Rat, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his sneaky and deadly playstyle, Twitch has become a favorite among players who enjoy ambushing their enemies and causing chaos on the battlefield. One of Twitch's most iconic skins is

which transforms the rat into a mischievous and cunning medieval rogue.

Released on November 29, 2010, Medieval Twitch quickly became a sought-after skin for Twitch enthusiasts. Priced at 975 RP, this skin offers a unique and thematic twist to the champion's appearance, allowing players to experience the thrill of playing as a medieval assassin.

Medieval Twitch: A Cloaked Assassin

Medieval Twitch outfits the Plague Rat in a dark, tattered cloak, reminiscent of a medieval rogue. The skin features Twitch wearing a hooded cloak, concealing his identity and adding an air of mystery to his character. His crossbow is also transformed into a medieval-style weapon, complete with intricate engravings and a wooden stock.

One of the standout features of Medieval Twitch is the visual effects it brings to the champion's abilities. When Twitch activates his Ambush ability, he becomes partially invisible, blending into the shadows and making it even harder for enemies to detect his presence. This effect is enhanced by the skin's medieval theme, as Twitch seems to vanish into thin air, leaving only his cloak behind.

Additionally, the skin introduces new sound effects that further enhance the medieval aesthetic. The sound of a creaking bowstring and the thud of arrows hitting their targets create an immersive experience for players, making them feel like a true medieval assassin.

Twitch: The Plague Rat

Twitch, the Plague Rat, is a unique and versatile champion in League of Legends. He is classified as a marksman, specializing in dealing damage from a distance. Twitch's playstyle revolves around positioning, stealth, and surprise attacks, making him a formidable opponent when played correctly.

Originally hailing from the sewers of Zaun, Twitch is a mutated rat who has gained sentience and a taste for chaos. Armed with his trusty crossbow, he spreads disease and terrorizes his enemies, leaving a trail of destruction in his wake.

One of Twitch's defining abilities is his Ambush, which allows him to become invisible for a short duration. This ability is crucial for Twitch players, as it enables them to set up surprise attacks and catch enemies off guard. Combined with his ultimate ability, Spray and Pray, Twitch can unleash a barrage of deadly bolts, piercing through multiple enemies and dealing massive damage.

However, Twitch's strength lies in his ability to position himself strategically. He is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making him vulnerable to crowd control and burst damage. To excel with Twitch, players must master the art of positioning, utilizing his stealth and range to their advantage.

In the world of League of Legends, Twitch has become an iconic champion, known for his unique playstyle and mischievous personality. His appearance as a medieval rogue in the form of Medieval Twitch adds another layer of depth to his character, allowing players to immerse themselves in the fantasy of being a stealthy assassin.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Twitch's appearances, including the Medieval Twitch skin. Whether you're a fan of Twitch or simply curious about his playstyle, exploring his various skins and abilities will surely enhance your League of Legends experience.

Twitch (Whistler Village Twitch)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: December 10, 2010

Twitch, the Plague Rat, is a mischievous and cunning champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his stealthy nature and deadly poison attacks, Twitch has become a favorite among players who enjoy playing as a sneaky and unpredictable character. With his Whistler Village Twitch skin, he takes on a whole new persona, blending into the snowy landscape with his festive attire.

Whistler Village Twitch is a unique skin that transforms Twitch into a mischievous rat ready to spread holiday cheer. Dressed in a cozy winter outfit, Twitch dons a warm hat, scarf, and mittens, all in vibrant red and green colors. His crossbow is also given a festive makeover, adorned with holly and jingle bells. As he scurries across the map, leaving footprints in the snow, he brings a touch of holiday spirit to the battlefield.

The Whistler Village Twitch skin was released on December 10, 2010, just in time for the holiday season. It quickly became a popular choice among players who wanted to add a festive twist to their Twitch gameplay. Priced at 1350 RP, this skin offers a unique visual experience and allows players to stand out from the crowd with its holiday-themed design.

Now, let's delve into the story of Twitch and explore his strengths, weaknesses, and his place in the game.

The Story of Twitch

Twitch, also known as the Plague Rat, hails from the sewers of Zaun, a dark and polluted city in the world of League of Legends. He is a mutated creature, a result of the toxic waste that permeates the city's underbelly. Twitch thrives in the filth and chaos, using his agility and deadly venom to survive.

As a champion, Twitch is classified as a marksman, specializing in ranged attacks and dealing sustained damage over time. His unique ability, Deadly Venom, allows him to poison his enemies with each attack, slowly whittling away their health. Twitch's ultimate ability, Spray and Pray, amplifies his attacks, allowing him to hit multiple enemies at once with his crossbow.

While Twitch excels at dealing damage from a distance, he is also incredibly fragile. His low health pool and lack of mobility make him vulnerable to assassins and burst damage champions. However, his stealth ability, Ambush, allows him to become invisible for a short duration, granting him the element of surprise and the ability to reposition himself during fights.

In the lore of League of Legends, Twitch is depicted as a chaotic and unpredictable character. He revels in spreading disease and chaos, often causing panic and fear among the inhabitants of Zaun. His Whistler Village Twitch skin adds a playful twist to his character, showcasing his mischievous side in a festive setting.

With his Whistler Village Twitch skin, players can enjoy a unique visual experience while playing as Twitch. The vibrant colors and holiday-themed design bring a touch of joy to the battlefield, making Twitch stand out among the other champions. Whether you're a fan of Twitch or simply looking to add some holiday cheer to your gameplay, the Whistler Village Twitch skin is a fantastic choice.

Dragonslayer Twitch is a fearsome skin that transforms the sneaky and mischievous rat into a formidable dragon slayer. With its release on November 20, 2014, this skin quickly became a favorite among Twitch players, offering a unique and visually stunning look for the champion.

The Dragonslayer Twitch skin features Twitch adorned in a suit of dragon-scale armor, complete with a dragon-themed crossbow. One of the standout features of the Dragonslayer Twitch skin is the visual effects. This adds an extra level of intensity and excitement to Twitch's gameplay, making him feel even more powerful as he rains down fire upon his enemies.

Furthermore, Dragonslayer Twitch also comes with unique recall animation. When Twitch recalls, he disappears in a puff of smoke, only to reappear riding a dragon and landing back on the ground. This recall animation adds a touch of flair and personality to the skin, making it a joy to use.

Now, let's delve into the story of Twitch and his place in the League of Legends universe. Twitch is a Yordle from Zaun, a city known for its dark and dangerous underbelly. In the game, Twitch is primarily played as a marksman in the bot lane. Twitch's Q ability, Ambush, allows him to go invisible for a short duration, making him a formidable ganker and assassin. His W ability, Venom Cask, slows enemies and amplifies the damage they take, while his E ability, Contaminate, allows him to detonate his poison stacks, dealing damage to all enemies affected. Finally, his ultimate ability, Spray and Pray, enhances his basic attacks, allowing them to pierce through multiple enemies and deal increased damage.

Twitch's lore within the League of Legends universe is equally intriguing. He is depicted as a scavenger, surviving in the sewers of Zaun and feeding off the waste and discarded items of the city. Over time, Twitch's exposure to the toxic environment of Zaun mutated him, granting him enhanced strength and agility, as well as a deadly venomous bite.

Despite his humble origins, Twitch has become a force to be reckoned with in the League of Legends. His unique playstyle and ability to surprise his enemies from the shadows make him a popular pick among players who enjoy a more unconventional approach to the game. Twitch's Story

Twitch's story within the League of Legends universe is as intriguing as his appearance. Born in the sewers of Zaun, a city known for its dark and dangerous underbelly, Twitch was exposed to toxic waste that mutated him into a hideous creature. With his newfound abilities, Twitch embraced his role as a scavenger and survivor, using his agility and poison to take down unsuspecting victims.

In the game, Twitch is classified as a marksman, specializing in ranged attacks and dealing massive damage over time. His passive ability, Deadly Venom, allows his basic attacks to apply stacks of poison to his enemies, which can be triggered for additional damage. Twitch's Q ability, Ambush, grants him invisibility for a short duration, allowing him to sneak up on enemies and unleash his deadly attacks. His W ability, Venom Cask, hurls a toxic projectile that slows and poisons enemies, while his E ability, Contaminate, spreads his poison to nearby enemies, dealing damage based on the number of stacks. Finally, Twitch's ultimate ability, Spray and Pray, enhances his basic attacks, allowing them to pierce through multiple enemies and deal increased damage.

While Twitch excels at dealing damage from a distance, he is also incredibly fragile and vulnerable to crowd control effects. Players must utilize his stealth and positioning abilities to their advantage, catching enemies off guard and quickly eliminating them before they have a chance to retaliate. Twitch's playstyle requires careful planning and strategy, making him a challenging but rewarding champion to master.

Within the League of Legends community, Twitch has become a beloved and iconic character. His unique appearance and playstyle have made him a popular choice among players who enjoy the thrill of surprise attacks and outmaneuvering their opponents. Now, let's delve into the lore and background of Twitch, the Plague Rat. In the world of League of Legends, Twitch is a yordle from Zaun, a city known for its dark and polluted underbelly.
